title: 你们觉得谁是mc里的神兽？

replies.txt_content: 标题: 你们觉得谁是mc里的神兽？你们觉得谁是mc里的神兽？

replies.author: MRTangwin8
replies.txt_content: 我觉得Steve是MC里的“神兽”

replies.author: 鳥妖
replies.txt_content:
MRTangwin8 发表于 2015-7-26 19:58
我觉得Steve是MC里的“神兽”
说得亚历克斯就不是一样

replies.author: Mark_Gold
replies.txt_content: 苦力怕，额。

replies.author: Brod
replies.txt_content: 高压苦力怕{:10_522:}这东西通常在正常的情况下见不到

replies.author: 猪蹄子
replies.txt_content: 当然是我啊！

replies.author: 达达丁
replies.txt_content: 我认为是苦力怕

replies.author: Sad_elevenKH
replies.txt_content: 土司兔子
岩浆怪是超稀有怪，非他莫属了

replies.author: 卡拉达之翼
replies.txt_content: 我觉得是苦力怕，因为它最独特

replies.author: snowclay
replies.txt_content: 当然是him

replies.author: dadage
replies.txt_content: 当然 是我

replies.author: 松__杍
replies.txt_content: 神“兽”当然是羊羊菌啦~

replies.author: aituonai
replies.txt_content: 苦力怕，MC中最出名的怪物

replies.author: G王者Z巨蟹Y
replies.txt_content: 虽然苦力怕很出名，但是从“神兽”的定义上来看，还是觉得HIM最适合

replies.author: 我chao爱MC
replies.txt_content: 苦力怕啊

replies.author: 绫玥
replies.txt_content: 苦力怕妥妥的，看他这么萌

replies.txt_content: 猪，因为……他会飞……会上树……会……跳”崖“自杀……[saddle]
